title: Is it worth reaching Platinum?
body:
My friends keep telling me to reach Platinum, because i'm quite close (Gold II here). However, i'm unsure if it's really worth it. Here is what Gold and Platinum have in common:

* Both Gold and Platinum get a Victorious skin at the end of ranked season.
* Both Gold and Platinum get a Summoner Icon.
* Both Gold and Platinum get a Loading Screen boarder & Banner Trim.

Only difference really is the color of that boarder, and the icon reflecting your rank. Not much difference really, apart from bragging rights. Do tell, do you guys think I should try reaching Platinum? At the beginning of this season, my goal was to reach Gold. I started out in Bronze II and climbed my way up, mostly solo but then getting friends to climb with me. After hitting Gold V, I was satisfied but people still wanted me to rank with them because i'm a great Support Main. After some time, I found myself nearing Platinum and I don't know how to feel about it personally.

What do you guys think? Should I risk my LP / dropping to reach it or stay put and enjoy Normals / URF / ARAM and not stress anymore?
